articles.title: Can COVID-19 trigger diabetes? - Medical News Today
articles.description: New research suggests that a severe form of COVID-19 may trigger diabetes in some people. Other experts have also weighed in on this potential causal link.
articles.content: An international group of diabetes experts believes that some people may develop diabetes for the first time due to severe COVID-19, the respiratory illness caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus. They have … [+5242 chars]
